settings.text: Our ideal is to look good, feel good and do good. Through DS Gives initiatives we seek to bring the comfort at the heart of our brand to those who need it most.

custom_css: em {top: -0.5em; position: relative; font-size: 60%; vertical-align: baseline;}

settings.text:
Dudley Stephens x St. Jude Children’s Research Hospital®

For children receiving lifesaving care at St. Jude Children’s Research Hospital, hope is everything.

We're proud to partner with St. Jude in 2022 to help advance their life-saving mission: Finding cures. Saving children.® St. Jude is leading the way the world understands, treats, and defeats childhood cancer and other life-threatening diseases. They pursue their mission while ensuring that families never receive a bill from St. Jude for treatment, travel, housing or food.

To date, our DS Gives partnership with St. Jude has raised over $200,000 to advance that life-saving mission.

custom_css: em {top: -0.5em; position: relative; font-size: 60%; vertical-align: baseline;}

settings.title: DS Gives Blanket in Sherpa Fleece
settings.text:
Do good—for the planet and for the children of St. Jude Children’s Research Hospital®—with this ultra-cozy lap blanket made with recycled Sherpa and Vello Fleece. For every purchase, we’ll donate a portion of proceeds to St. Jude’s lifesaving mission: Finding Cures. Saving Children®.

*While supplies last

custom_css: em {top: -0.5em; position: relative; font-size: 60%; vertical-align: baseline;}

settings.text:
For children receiving lifesaving care at St. Jude Children’s Research Hospital®, hope is everything.

We're proud to partner with St. Jude in 2021 to help advance their life-saving mission: Finding cures. Saving children.® St. Jude is leading the way the world understands, treats, and defeats childhood cancer and other life-threatening diseases.

They pursue their mission while ensuring that no family receives a bill from St. Jude for anything.
